name: Take Yourself With You
description:
I made this game in 2017 as an interactive theatre piece for a class outcome, but never really knew what to do with it beyond that until I discovered lyric games on itch and realized that I had already made something that kind of fit the genre.  So I updated the piece to be entirely playable online, which, if I'm being honest, is what it's best suited for anyway.

Let me know if you get anything out of this-- I've been replaying it every few years since I first made it when I was 19 and I always find some comfort in having this conversation with my younger self.
